title: Pilot
episode_desc: Louie goes on a date as well as a field trip with his daughters. Both go badly.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Poker/Divorce
episode_desc: Louie and his friends have a discussion about homosexuality with a gay friend during a poker game. After Louie's divorce is finalized, he looks up a woman he had a "moment" with back in school.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Dr. Ben/Nick
episode_desc: Louie goes to the doctor and argues with an old friend.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: So Old/Playdate
episode_desc: Louie's age is an advantage and he sets up a play date.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Travel Day/South
episode_desc: Louie goes on a trip. Louie plays the South.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Heckler/Cop Movie
episode_desc: Louie reluctantly acts in a movie.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Double Date/Mom
episode_desc: Louie's brother comes to him with an odd request related to his date, and Louie's mom comes to tell him that she is a lesbian.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Dogpound
episode_desc: While the kids are away, Louie eats a lot of ice cream, gets high with a neighbor, and rescues an old dog from the pound.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Bully
episode_desc: Louie recalls his awkward sex education lessons as a child, and a high school bully threatens Louie in a donut shop and ruins his date.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Dentist/Tarese
episode_desc: Louie tries to overcome his fear of dentists, and tries to get a date with an African American grocery cashier.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: God
episode_desc: Louie recalls a traumatic lesson from Catholic school about Jesus dying for his sins.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Gym
episode_desc: Louie fantasizes about a TV news anchor, and winds up in the hospital after working out with his new personal trainer.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Night Out
episode_desc: Louie goes out for the night.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Pregnant
episode_desc: Louie gets a surprise visit from his pregnant sister, who has to be rushed to the hospital in the middle of the night with severe pains.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Bummer/Blueberries
episode_desc: Louie witnesses a bum's death on his way to a date, and gets propositioned for casual sex by a single mom at his daughter's school.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Moving
episode_desc: Louie has trouble finding a nice apartment, and when he finally finds a home he wants to buy, it is impossibly out of his price range.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Joan
episode_desc: Louie quits a lounge gig at an Atlantic City casino after a bad night and winds up hanging out with Joan Rivers.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Country Drive
episode_desc: When Louis decides to visit his great aunt, he takes his kids on a country drive to visit her. But when he arrives his kids and him notice her past self and devastating news.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Subway/Pamela
episode_desc: Louie rides the subway and hangs out with his friend.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Oh Louie/Tickets
episode_desc: Louie remembers his past career failures and tries to get concert tickets for his daughter.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Come On, God
episode_desc: Louie explores one of his lifelong habits.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Eddie
episode_desc: Louie reunites with an old friend.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Halloween/Ellie
episode_desc: Halloween is in the air and Louis and his kids go trick or treating. But when they go trick or treating, Louis and his kids meet some very bad people, in which Louis has to fend off to protect him and his kids.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Duckling
episode_desc: Louie leaves for Afghanistan to entertain the troops, but he doesn't know that one of his daughters left him a surprise in his suitcase.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Niece
episode_desc: Louie takes care of his niece while her mother leaves for Philadelphia, but he has no idea how to communicate with her.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: New Jersey/Airport
episode_desc: Louie has a pretty bad time in general.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Something Is Wrong
episode_desc: Louie breaks up with his new love interest, gets his car destroyed by a construction crew, buys a new motorcycle, and winds up in the hospital.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Telling Jokes/Set Up
episode_desc: Louie agrees to dinner at a comedian friend's house, not knowing that he is about to be set up on a date.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Miami
episode_desc: Louie goes to Miami, makes friends with a Cuban-American lifeguard, and decides to extend the trip to hang out with him a little longer--leading to an awkward conversation.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Daddy's Girlfriend: Part 1
episode_desc: After Louie's kids put pressure him to find a girlfriend, he finds a potential prospect at the local bookstore.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Daddy's Girlfriend: Part 2
episode_desc: Louie goes out on an adventurous first date with the woman he met at the bookstore.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Barney/Never
episode_desc: Louie has lunch and goes to a strip club with a man he meets at a friend's gravesite, and babysits for a friend's socially-awkward son.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Ikea/Piano Lesson
episode_desc: Louie takes an awkward shopping trip with a female acquaintance, Louie gets some disturbing news from a different woman during a piano lesson, and Louie tries to make amends with an old friend.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Dad
episode_desc: After his uncle visits and tells him to go to Boston to see his father, Louie breaks out and begins throwing up.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Looking for Liz/Lilly Changes
episode_desc: Louie learns that Liz no longer works at the bookstore, and her replacement employee helps Louie try to find her; Louie calls the police after Jane tells him that Lilly left home.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Late Show: Part 1
episode_desc: Louie takes advantage of an incredible opportunity on The Tonight Show and gets a potential job offer afterwards that could change his life.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Late Show: Part 2
episode_desc: Louie's "training" gets off to a rough start as he prepares for his chance to audition for David Letterman's job.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Late Show: Part 3
episode_desc: Right before Louie shoots his talk show pilot, Jerry Seinfeld comes to him some surprising news.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: New Year's Eve
episode_desc: Louie is alone after Christmas and has a traumatic New Year's Eve, so he decides to get away from it all--in China.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Back
episode_desc: Louie injures his back while shopping for a vibrator.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Model
episode_desc: Louie has a horrible night introducing Jerry Seinfeld for a benefit in the Hamptons, but his luck changes when he runs into a model who actually liked his act.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: So Did the Fat Lady
episode_desc: A fat woman who works at the comedy club keeps asking Louie out on a date, but Louie is not interested.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Elevator: Part 1
episode_desc: Louie freaks out when he loses Jane on the subway; Louie helps out a woman in his building who gets stuck in the elevator.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Elevator: Part 2
episode_desc: Louie's visit to the woman who got stuck in the elevator is interrupted when Jane gets in trouble at school; Louie takes an interest in the elevator woman's niece, Amia.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Elevator: Part 3
episode_desc: An old flame returns to New York, but Louie rejects her because he is interested in Amia, who then comes to him with some bad news. Louie and his ex have a meeting at school about Jane.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Elevator: Part 4
episode_desc: Louie and Janet spend the day together and issues arise, issues like their kids, their divorce, and Louie's life in its whole. Also, Louie has a flashback surrounding his and his ex-wife's marriage.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Elevator: Part 5
episode_desc: Louie's friend, Todd Barry, tells a hilarious story about the events of his day; Louie is torn about taking his relationship with Amia to the next level even though she is about to leave.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Elevator: Part 6
episode_desc: The tension between Louie and Amia after they sleep together is put on hold when Louie has to save his kids and ex-wife from the hurricane.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Pamela: Part 1
episode_desc: Still heartbroken over losing Amia, Louie turns to Pamela to see if her offer still stands.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: In the Woods: Part 1
episode_desc: When Louie catches Lily smoking pot, he flashes back to a similar period from his own childhood.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: In the Woods: Part 2
episode_desc: Young Louie's drug problem begins to escalate, and he must eventually face the consequences of his actions.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Pamela: Part 2
episode_desc: Louie talks Pamela into going out on a date with him, but will it end in just more frustration?
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Pamela: Part 3
episode_desc: Pamela and Louie's daughters, Lilly and Jane, hit it off from the start. She also gets to meet Janet, Louie's ex-wife. After a nice afternoon and a less nice evening, Louie confesses his love to Pamela but doesn't get the reaction he wants.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Pot Luck
episode_desc: Louie goes to a pot luck dinner for the parents in Lily's class, but ends up going to the wrong party. When he finally reaches the right party, he has an unusual encounter with the surrogate mother of the couple hosting the dinner.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: A La Carte
episode_desc: An urgent matter cuts Louie's grocery trip short. Louie gives some frank advice to a struggling amateur during Open Mic Night. Pamela and Louie try to set the parameters of their relationship.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Cop Story
episode_desc: Louie has an uncomfortable evening with a police officer who was once engaged to his sister.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Bobby's House
episode_desc: Louie goes to a wake with his brother. Louie gets beat up on the street by a woman. Pamela gives Louie a makeover to mask his injuries so he can perform on stage.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Untitled
episode_desc: After taking Jane to the doctor and picking Lilly up from a sitter, Louie begins having horrific recurring nightmares that he can't escape from.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: Sleepover
episode_desc: Louie is upset when he sees Lily texting in the middle of a Broadway play. Louie hosts a birthday slumber party for Jane, but it is interrupted by two unexpected phone calls.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: The Road: Part 1
episode_desc: Louie goes on the road and is stuck in Cincinnati in a bad hotel with talkative driver. He then loses his carry-on bag at the Atlanta airport while helping a lost child.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.

title: The Road: Part 2
episode_desc: Louie's road trip continues in Oklahoma City, where's he's stuck sharing a condo with an crude, obnoxious opening act who tells a bunch of fart jokes.
show_desc: The life of Louie C.K., a divorced comedian living in New York with two kids.
